caption.title: Initial wetting behaviour upon lithium-ion battery electrolyte injection.
caption.p: ( a) Layer size evolution of the mica–mica (green), mica–gold (red) and mica–graphene (blue) opposing materials during electrolyte injection. Population analysis of the collected data for opposing materials: ( b) mica–graphene, ( c) mica–mica and ( d) mica–gold.
